channel.title: [PI] SoulPlanet
channel.description:
Yaa, deleted maan i'm sorry dawg, i'd thought that this will be amazing but it isn't. I will work on another PI, but will totally not start with torvapkz.
Thanks for your feedback, i will try to improve my skills (:
Thanks to : Ambokile for not being a dickhead and for the hope that i could improve it next time
Sk8rdude for his opinion, recommendation
Fitch for his good feedback <3
Joseph96 for his good feedback <3
Shame, eclipse rsps, shuhag = *facepalm*

item.title: [PI] SoulPlanet

@xXSh0ckXx wrote:

Alright i understood this, go with ur opinion to someone other -.-

Lock please

Read full topic

@CoderOops wrote:

I dont see anything unique… Just 1 more waterdrop in ocean…

Read full topic

item.title: [PI] SoulPlanet
item.dc:creator: @xXSh0ckXx xXSh0ckXx
item.description:
@xXSh0ckXx wrote:

shuhag:

What base is this? Torvapkz?

Shane:

Nothing special. Looks like ErasedPkz if so there will tons of dupes.

cderty:

are people really giving this praise? it’s a standard impozzes/insidia source with names changed and npc’s moved and very few tutorials c+p’d? moparscape is in the dumbing down stage

[quote=“eclipse rsps, post:17, topic:523103”][quote author=xXSh0ckXx link=topic=641655.msg4322710#msg4322710 date=1372418971]

I sometimes have to check if I didn’t open the same thread twice.
There are a quadrillion of these servers around.
They all look the same, nothing of originality and nothing of personal input (unless you count following tutorials that have been used in every server like this as well, personal input)
I’ll give it a 1/10 because you at least provided an update-log even I barely see anything worth mentioning.
Unless changing text-colors was a big challenge for you of course.

Lmfao, that shit took me a lot of time… I’d added so much shit what other server released servers dont have, so much people told me alreadY that this is a unique server what i had. Nty not accepting your opinion bro. The only thing what i agree with you is that the layout is the same like the other servers, but the way it is, is completely different. Dont forget this is my first project released ever .
[/quote]No, “bro”. There is nothing unique here at all.[/quote]
Btw. This is your opinion

Read full topic

item.title: [PI] SoulPlanet
item.dc:creator: @xXSh0ckXx xXSh0ckXx
item.description:
@xXSh0ckXx wrote:

Ambokile:

Why don’t you accept feedback instead of just saying that he’s wrong? It may be your first server, but why not take note of what he said and improve it?

I sometimes have to check if I didn’t open the same thread twice.
There are a quadrillion of these servers around.
They all look the same, nothing of originality and nothing of personal input (unless you count following tutorials that have been used in every server like this as well, personal input)
I’ll give it a 1/10 because you at least provided an update-log even I barely see anything worth mentioning.
Unless changing text-colors was a big challenge for you of course.

Lmfao, that shit took me a lot of time… I’d added so much shit what other server released servers dont have, so much people told me alreadY that this is a unique server what i had. Nty not accepting your opinion bro. The only thing what i agree with you is that the layout is the same like the other servers, but the way it is, is completely different. Dont forget this is my first project released ever .
[/quote]Actually sorry babe but I have to agree with RandQm on this one. I really see nothing significant that stands out.

That isn’t what is important though. What is important though is that you learned from this.[/quote]

You guys are right, i should use the feedback to improve it next time :’/ Not being a **king Dck

Read full topic
